harvest.label: Harvest
harvest.description: Class Features, Feats, or Spells with this Trait can either generate Soul Shards, Hit Points, or Temporary HP by harvesting soulforce from a creature. That creature must have something akin to soulforce present within them, living or undead. Almost exclusively this limitation applies Construct.

wind-up.label: Wind Up
wind-up.description: Feats or Soul Arts with this trait modify and enhance the next Strike you make on your Turn, even if that Strike is part of another Action.
